description: A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. This one has the number 13 on the back in yellow, and has been customized with more storage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A thin, blue jumpsuit, with a few pockets, with a yellow zipper down the front  Provides decent storage and is not very encumbering. It's customizable for the Vault Dweller with priorities, and has a belt with pouches on it to make up for it's lack of pockets. It's lightly armored, has more pouches, and has a bright yellow 13 on it's back.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of handmade metal armor. The arms have spiked pauldrons  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A strange device, constructed from an odd technology...  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a snake contorted into an 's'. The jacket makes you feel like you rule.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a crown with the words 'The Kings' written in it. Hail to the king, baby.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. Its decorated with a flame pattern, and has the image of a skull with the words 'Great Khans' on the back. The sleeves were cut off. Brutal.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A jacket made from thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts. On the back is the image of a mushroom cloud and a cat, with the words 'atom cats' printed. You feel like a cool cat just wearing this.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of leapard-print pajama pants. Perfect for seduction, or just sleeping.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A leopard-print nightshirt. For when you want to show your sexual prowess in a tacky, yet oddly endearing way.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A green jumpsuit with Chinese flag patches on it. Seems to have been worn by a chinese infiltrator.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A red mechanic's jumpsuit from a tricycle factory. Pockets abound for all your tools and spare parts.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A black jumpsuit worn by Enclave personel. Its not very warm, and is meant to be worn under their armor.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A tough hooded jacket with lots of pockets, thickly padded for warmth.  Favored by the eastern branch of the Enclave.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A tough pair of pants lined with pockets, thickly padded for warmth.  Favored by the eastern branch of the Enclave.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An enclave officer's hat. Black, with the enclave logo above the brim.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A light brown leather full-length duster, worn by the Commonwealth Minutemen, a small, presumably dead group of militiamen.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick dark blue duster, once worn by the general of the Commonwealth Minutemen. It's yours now, general.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick, red longcoat.  Has many pockets for storage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  It seems to just demand respect.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  It seems to just demand respect.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thick leather trenchcoat, lined with pockets.  If someone wearing this approaches you, run.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A great general's hat. Respect the man wearing this.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A great general's hat. Perfect for attacking Russia when you really shouldn't attack Russia.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
The hat of pure evil. Do not trust it's wearer.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A burlap sack and a pair of goggles, turned into a menacing mask.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A heavy, round helmet that provides excellent protection from blunt impacts.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A warm ushanka with a disgusting red star on the front.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A paper-mache mask in the image of a psychotic-looking clown. Its modelled after the infamous serial killer.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A paper-mache mask in the image of a psychotic-looking clown. Its modelled after the infamous serial killer. Something feels... off about this one.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A black and white plaid suit. Perfect for gamblers, or those just gambling with destiny.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A leather flight jacket covered in military medals.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple white set of scientist's scrubs. They lack storage, or durability, but theyre ideal for science.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A tan button-down shirt with long sleeves, and an NCR patch on the front.  Looks professional!  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of brown pants with two deep pockets.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of brown body armor used by NCR troopers and rangers. Provides great environmental protection  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of handcrafted heavy-steel armor from out west, worn by only the greatest warriors. Well, no traditionalists are here to stop you now.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
The helmet of the legate, Caesar's most powerful warrior. It has a face design, and is incredibly beautiful.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A hazmat suit made to protect from foreign materials. It is incredibly durable compared to other similar models, though its a bit bulkier. It needs a separate gas mask.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A soft, red cotton hat. Worn by the NCR's 1st Recon division; 'The last things you'll never see'.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small bike helmet outfitted with a horned skull.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A thin cotton jacket made to represent a college football team.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of full body green armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its covered in pockets and pouches.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A suit of full body white armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its much warmer than similar armors.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A suit of full body white armor used by army personell shortly before the cataclysm. Its much warmer than similar armors, though not as protective. It has a large red cross on the back, to signify you're not an active combatant. Sadly, zombies don't recognize the Geneva Convention.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A heavy helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A heavy winterized helmet that provides excellent protection from all sorts of damage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A warm, white covering that protects the head and face from the cold. It's reinforced with Kevlar to protect your face.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
